utterances.speaker: system
utterances.text: So, thinking about your everyday life, can you tell me about a time recently when you felt like you really needed coffee or found yourself reaching for it?

utterances.speaker: user
utterances.text: i do it every morning, i need a coffee to kick-start the day

utterances.speaker: system
utterances.text: What else do you find yourself needing coffee for during your day, besides that morning kick-start?

utterances.speaker: user
utterances.text: I have another cup mid morning and then another one after lunch

utterances.speaker: system
utterances.text: What is it about those particular times of day that makes you want a coffee then?

utterances.speaker: user
utterances.text: keep my energy level, help to maintain the focus, and maybe have a little break

utterances.speaker: system
utterances.text: What else does coffee do for you throughout your day, beyond the energy and focus?

utterances.speaker: user
utterances.text: as i said, it is about having a small break from the daily route

utterances.speaker: system
utterances.text: What other things do you look for in your daily routine besides those coffee breaks?

utterances.speaker: user
utterances.text: I am not really looking forward to the routine, i am not sure i understand the question

utterances.speaker: system
utterances.text: What else about coffee matters to you, beyond what we've talked about so far?

utterances.speaker: user
utterances.text: nice aroma, pleasant taste, right caffeine strength

utterances.speaker: system
utterances.text: What else makes a good coffee experience for you besides the aroma, taste, and caffeine?

utterances.speaker: user
utterances.text: that i do not have to rush, i can take my time to drink it

utterances.speaker: system
utterances.text: What is it about being able to take your time that matters to you?

utterances.speaker: user
utterances.text: i want to switch off. It helps me to clear my mind, regain focus

utterances.speaker: system
utterances.text: Why is regaining focus important to you?

utterances.speaker: user
utterances.text: I need it to be efficient, do my job properly

utterances.speaker: system
utterances.text: What does being able to do your job properly mean to you?

utterances.speaker: user
utterances.text: it means I can be my best and realise my potential

utterances.speaker: system
utterances.text: Why is realizing your potential important to you?

utterances.speaker: user
utterances.text: Because that makes life worth living

utterances.speaker: system
utterances.text: What is it about having a life worth living that matters to you?

utterances.speaker: user
utterances.text: I don't know, we don't live forever, so it is worth to live your life in full

utterances.speaker: system
utterances.text: What does living life in full mean to you?

utterances.speaker: user
utterances.text: Doing interesting things, having fun, enjoy

utterances.speaker: system
utterances.text: When you think about enjoying life and having fun, why does that feel so essential to you?

utterances.speaker: user
utterances.text: I don't know, it just does

utterances.speaker: system
utterances.text: What would life be like for you if you weren't able to enjoy things and have fun?

utterances.speaker: user
utterances.text: sad, miserable, boring

utterances.speaker: system
utterances.text: What is it about feeling sad or miserable that concerns you most?

utterances.speaker: user
utterances.text: i just do not like to feel like that

utterances.speaker: system
utterances.text: When you think about not wanting to feel that way, what else matters to you about how you experience your daily life?

utterances.speaker: user
utterances.text: i do not understand the question

utterances.speaker: system
utterances.text: Let me ask it differently - besides avoiding feeling sad or miserable, what other things are important to you in your day-to-day life?

utterances.speaker: user
utterances.text: making sure i set a good example for others, inspire people around me to be their best

utterances.speaker: system
utterances.text: When you think about setting a good example and inspiring others to be their best, why does that matter so much to you?

utterances.speaker: user
utterances.text: It just feels like that

utterances.speaker: system
utterances.text: What does it feel like when you know you've inspired someone or set that good example?

utterances.speaker: user
utterances.text: i am proud of myself and of the person i inspired

utterances.speaker: system
utterances.text: Thank you for sharing your thoughts with me today. This has been very helpful.

nodes.label: small break from the daily route
not looking forward to the routine
can take my time to drink it
not wanting to feel sad or miserable
set a good example for others
inspire people around me to be their best
proud of the person i inspired
